title: Attributed Model Conversions
description: Attributed Model Conversions is the Raw Conversion Count and Sum of Conversions

adcloud:searchEngineId.title: Search Engine Identifier
adcloud:searchEngineId.description: The application-specified identifier used to identify the Search Advertising Platform Name

adcloud:campaignId.title: Campaign Identifier
adcloud:campaignId.description: Campaign Identifer on the advertising platform

adcloud:placementId.title: Placement Identifier
adcloud:placementId.description: Placement ID on the dsp advertising platform

adcloud:adgroupId.title: Ad Group Identifier
adcloud:adgroupId.description: Ad Group ID on the search advertising platform

adcloud:adId.title: Ad Identifier
adcloud:adId.description: Ad ID on the advertising platform

adcloud:term.title: Search Term
adcloud:term.description: Search Term that contributed to the conversion

adcloud:termId.title: Search Term Identifier
adcloud:termId.description: Search Term ID on the search advertising platform

adcloud:matchType.title: Term Match Type
adcloud:matchType.description: Match Type associated to the Search Term being targeted for the Ad

adcloud:propertyName.title: Property Name
adcloud:propertyName.description: Property Name Configured by Pixel, Analytics, Custom Feeds

adcloud:modelName.title: Model Name
adcloud:modelName.description: Model that was executed to generate Raw Conversion Count and Sum for the attributed conversion

adcloud:clickThroughCount.title: Click Through Conversion Count
adcloud:clickThroughCount.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Count for models if trigger event is Click

adcloud:clickThroughValue.title: Click Through Conversion Sum
adcloud:clickThroughValue.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Sum for models if trigger event is Click

adcloud:viewThroughCount.title: View Through Conversion Count
adcloud:viewThroughCount.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Count for models if trigger event is Impression

adcloud:viewThroughValue.title: View Through Conversion Sum
adcloud:viewThroughValue.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Sum for models if trigger event is Impression

adcloud:clickPlusViewThroughCount.title: Click Plus View Through Conversion Count
adcloud:clickPlusViewThroughCount.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Count for models if trigger event is click but impressions present in path

adcloud:clickPlusViewThroughValue.title: Click Plus View Through Conversion Sum
adcloud:clickPlusViewThroughValue.description: Evaluated as Raw Conversion Sum for models if trigger event is click but impressions present in path

adcloud:viewPlusClickThroughCount.title: View Plus Click Through Conversion Count
adcloud:viewPlusClickThroughCount.description: Raw Conversion Count for models if trigger event is impression but clicks present in path

adcloud:viewPlusClickThroughValue.title: View Plus Click Through Conversion Sum
adcloud:viewPlusClickThroughValue.description: Raw Conversion Sum for models if trigger event is impression but clicks present in path

adcloud:conversionType.title: Conversion Type
adcloud:conversionType.description: Feed Conversion Type the conversion event originated from

adcloud:device.title: Device
adcloud:device.description: The device conversion event originated from
